title:
Customizable User
Experience
description: Fully customise the authentication experience based your organisations's branding. From custom domains to service emails, you can personalise it all taking into consideration the application context.

leftColumn.title: Hosted Login
leftColumn.text: Leverage a pre-built, customisable login experience including registration, account validation, MFA enrollment and more.

rightColumn.title: Embedded Login
rightColumn.text: Take your tailoring needs to the next level. With embedding login you can build your own authentication page.
